attributes.title: THE SCIENCE OF PRATYAHARA  || 21 JULY 2021
attributes.description:
21 JULY 2021, WEDNESDAY (IST) - ENGLISH AND TAMIL NITHYANANDA SATSANG GIST
08:29 PM - THE SPH DARSHAN
SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM (SPH), JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM (JGM), HIS DIVINE HOLINESS (HDH) BHAGAWAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM.  
8TH DAY OF THE GURU PURNIMA BRAHMOTSAVAM 
09:01 PM - 10:35 PM - NITHYANANDA SATSANG AND POWERFUL INITIATION
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*புலன் நமக்கு புலப்படாத பொழுதும், உயிர் உயிர்த்திருக்கும் உத்தமத் தன்மைக்கு நம்மை புலப்படுத்திக் கொள்ளலே சத்ய ப்ரத்யாஹாரம்.  
*I WILL REPEAT LISTEN.  
புலனெல்லாம் நமக்கு அடங்கி புலப்படாது போகும் காலமும், உயிர்ப்பை உயிர்ப்பிக்கும் உட்சாக சத்தியத்தை உணர்த்தும் விதமாய் வாழ்க்கையை உயர்திக் கொள்ளல் சத்ய ப்ரத்யாஹாரம்.
*I WILL TRANSLATE:
THERE WILL BE A TIME IN YOUR LIFE WHERE YOUR SENSES WILL NOT BE ACTIVE. 
*NOW ITSELF DECLARING YOUR CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY OVER YOUR SENSES, AND EVEN WHEN THEY ARE NOT ACTIVE, NOT ALIVE, NOT EXCITED, NOT FUNCTIONING, YOU REMAINING ALIVE, ACTIVE, POWERFUL, IS PRATYAHARA. 
*THAT IS THE ACHIEVEMENT YOUR BODY NEEDS TO DO TO MANIFEST CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
*THIS TEACHING I DIRECTLY RECEIVED FROM ARUNAGIRI YOGISHWARA, PARAMASHIVA HIMSELF.
*HE TAUGHT ME WITH A BEAUTIFUL EXAMPLE.
*HE EXPLAINED HOW PEOPLE DIE IN THEIR OLD AGE. HE EXPLAINED HOW ONE BY ONE THE SENSES STOP FUNCTIONING - THE EYES SLOWLY BECOME DIM, SKIN LOSE ITS CAPACITY TO EXPERIENCE SEX, THEN TO EXPERIENCE EVEN SENSUALITY, THEN IT STOPS ITS ABILITY TO EXPERIENCE EVEN A TOUCH, LOVE OR CARE, THEN IT LOSES ITS EXPERIENCE EVEN TO SENSE.
*THEN THE TONGUE, HOW IT LOSES ITS ABILITY TO TASTE, THEN ITS ABILITY TO VERBALISE WHAT GOES ON INSIDE.
*EARS, HOW IT LOSES ITS ABILITY TO RECEIVE SOUNDS OR INFORMATION AND PROCESS. 
*EVEN WHILE ALL THESE SENSES DON'T FUNCTION WELL OR ARE NOT EXCITED, ACTIVE, INSPIRED TO BE ALIVE, IF YOU ARE ALIVE, THAT IS WHAT IS POWER OF CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
